<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826857135')
    }
</script>

   document.write ("&amp;loc=" + escape(window.location));
   if (document.referrer) document.write ("&amp;referer=" + escape(document.referrer));
   if (document.context) document.write ("&context=" + escape(document.context));
   if (document.mmm_fo) document.write ("&amp;mmm_fo=1");
   document.write ("'><\/scr"+"ipt>");
//]]>--></script><noscript><a href='http://revive.hellorf.com/www/delivery/ck.php?n=afcc79bc&amp;cb=INSERT_RANDOM_NUMBER_HERE' target='_blank'><img src='http://revive.hellorf.com/www/delivery/avw.php?zoneid=20&amp;cb=INSERT_RANDOM_NUMBER_HERE&amp;n=afcc79bc' border='0' alt='' /></a></noscript>
                </li>

<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/statistics.js?version=1557826857135"></script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/widget/slider/js/unslider.js?version=1557826857135"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/biz/tuijian-designer.js?version=1557826857135"></script>
<script>
    $(function(){
        navTypeTopFix()
        /*-- 轮播图开始 --*/
        if ($.fn.unslider) {
            $('.banner').unslider({
                autoplay: true,
                arrows: true,
                speed: 500,
                delay: 3500,
                infinite: true,
                fluid: true
            })
        }

        $('.slider').hover(function (event) {
            event.stopPropagation()
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').show()
        }, function () {
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').hide()
        })

        var onoff = false;
        function homeRelateUpdate(){
            if ($('.js-related-covers').length && $(document).scrollTop() > $('.js-related-covers').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
                onoff = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                            if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                                showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                        
                                $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})
                                
                                var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                                $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                                compuTitWidth();
                                registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                                asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                                // view
                                idss = "";
                                $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                    idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                                })
                                var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                                var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                                statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                        
                    }
                })
            }
        }
        homeRelateUpdate()
        $(window).scroll(function () {
            homeRelateUpdate()
        })
        // 点击推荐 ~ 换一换
        swithFlag = false;
        $('.home-switch').on('click',function(){
            if(!swithFlag){
                swithFlag = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                        if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                            showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                            // 获取最后一个作品的id、type、day
                            $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})

                            var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                            $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                            compuTitWidth();
                            registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                            asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                            swithFlag = false;
                            // view
                            idss = "";
                            $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                            })
                            var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                            var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                            statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                    }
                })
            }
        })
        
        
        if($('#cubeAd').length){
            var cube_ad = getCookieKey('cube_ad');
            var value = $('.ad-a img').attr('src')
            var cubeAd = value.substring(value.indexOf('community/'))
            if(cubeAd != cube_ad){
                $('#cubeAd').removeClass('hide')
                $('#body').addClass('cube-ad-body')
            }
        }
        
        $('#adClose').on('click',function(){
            
          setCookies_withDomain('cube_ad',cubeAd,zRootDomain)
          $('#cubeAd').addClass('hide')
          $('#body').removeClass('cube-ad-body')
        })
    })

</script>
</body>
</html>

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826857194')
    }
</script>

<script>
    gogoupDomain = 'gogoup.com';
    hellorfDomain = 'hellorf.com';

    passportDomain = 'passport.zcool.com.cn';
    staticDomain = 'static.zcool.cn/git_z';

    zMyDomain = 'my.zcool.com.cn';
    zMainDomain = 'www.zcool.com.cn';
    zRootDomain = 'zcool.com.cn';

    oldRootDomain = 'old.zcool.com.cn';

    appId = '1006';

    zUploadDomain = 'upload.zcool.com.cn';

    zProtocol = 'https://';
    logDomain = 'log.zcool.com.cn';
</script>



        <script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/lanage/messagesWeb.js?version=1557826857194"></script>
    
<script src="https://res.wx.qq.com/connect/zh_CN/htmledition/js/wxLogin.js"></script>
<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/build/js/libs.min.js?version=1557826857194"></script>
<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/statistics.js?version=1557826857194"></script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/widget/slider/js/unslider.js?version=1557826857194"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/biz/tuijian-designer.js?version=1557826857194"></script>
<script>
    $(function(){
        navTypeTopFix()
        /*-- 轮播图开始 --*/
        if ($.fn.unslider) {
            $('.banner').unslider({
                autoplay: true,
                arrows: true,
                speed: 500,
                delay: 3500,
                infinite: true,
                fluid: true
            })
        }

        $('.slider').hover(function (event) {
            event.stopPropagation()
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').show()
        }, function () {
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').hide()
        })

        var onoff = false;
        function homeRelateUpdate(){
            if ($('.js-related-covers').length && $(document).scrollTop() > $('.js-related-covers').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
                onoff = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                            if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                                showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                        
                                $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})
                                
                                var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                                $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                                compuTitWidth();
                                registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                                asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                                // view
                                idss = "";
                                $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                    idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                                })
                                var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                                var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                                statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                        
                    }
                })
            }
        }
        homeRelateUpdate()
        $(window).scroll(function () {
            homeRelateUpdate()
        })
        // 点击推荐 ~ 换一换
        swithFlag = false;
        $('.home-switch').on('click',function(){
            if(!swithFlag){
                swithFlag = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                        if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                            showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                            // 获取最后一个作品的id、type、day
                            $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})

                            var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                            $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                            compuTitWidth();
                            registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                            asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                            swithFlag = false;
                            // view
                            idss = "";
                            $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                            })
                            var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                            var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                            statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                    }
                })
            }
        })
        
        
        if($('#cubeAd').length){
            var cube_ad = getCookieKey('cube_ad');
            var value = $('.ad-a img').attr('src')
            var cubeAd = value.substring(value.indexOf('community/'))
            if(cubeAd != cube_ad){
                $('#cubeAd').removeClass('hide')
                $('#body').addClass('cube-ad-body')
            }
        }
        
        $('#adClose').on('click',function(){
            
          setCookies_withDomain('cube_ad',cubeAd,zRootDomain)
          $('#cubeAd').addClass('hide')
          $('#body').removeClass('cube-ad-body')
        })
    })

</script>
</body>
</html>

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826965747')
    }
</script>

                        </a>
                    {{/if}}

                    {{if honor.id != 9}}
                        {{if honor.url != ''}}
                            <a href="{{honor.url}}" class="title-icon" target="_blank" z-st="user_honor">
                                <img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="">
                            </a>
                        {{else}}
                            <a href="javascript:;" class="title-icon cursor-default" z-st="user_honor">
                                <img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="">
                            </a>
                        {{/if}}
                    {{/if}}
                {{/each}}
            </span>
        </span>
    {{/if}}
</script>

<script>
    gogoupDomain = 'gogoup.com';
    hellorfDomain = 'hellorf.com';

    passportDomain = 'passport.zcool.com.cn';
    staticDomain = 'static.zcool.cn/git_z';

    zMyDomain = 'my.zcool.com.cn';
    zMainDomain = 'www.zcool.com.cn';
    zRootDomain = 'zcool.com.cn';

    oldRootDomain = 'old.zcool.com.cn';

    appId = '1006';

    zUploadDomain = 'upload.zcool.com.cn';

    zProtocol = 'https://';
    logDomain = 'log.zcool.com.cn';
</script>



        <script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/lanage/messagesWeb.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
    
<script src="https://res.wx.qq.com/connect/zh_CN/htmledition/js/wxLogin.js"></script>
<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/build/js/libs.min.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/statistics.js?version=1557826965747"></script>

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826964214')
    }
</script>

                            <i></i>1554
                        </a>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!--文章简介-->
        <div class="work-decoration-title">
            <p> 作者：阿里巴巴国际用户体验事业部 佳棋</p>
        </div>
        <!--文章内容-->
        <div class="left-img-con">
            <!--文章内容区域, 文字,图片和视频-->
            <div class="work-show-box">
                <input name="" data-id="0" class="content-works" type="hidden">
                <div class="article-content-wraper">
                    <!--编辑器内容-->
                    <h3>前言</h3> 
<p>阿里巴巴副总裁、中国内贸事业部总经理汪海（花名七公）在对外分享时提出1688已经从信息平台时代进入数字化营销平台时代，让1688用户在平台内完成营销和销售一体化的整个商业闭环。1688的使命也升级成“在数字化经济时代，让天下没有难做的生意！”在全新的业务态势下，为了更好的满足用户需求，阿里巴巴(1688)主客升级势在必行。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01cb665cdd2a95a8012141686a1a26.png" style=""></p> 
<p><span style="font-size: 24px;">首页重要性</span></p> 
<p>首页既是业务分流的中心场景，也是平台卖家判断平台打法，买卖家感知平台价值的重要“门面”。从UED专业视角来看，首页是定义APP内体验范式及视觉风格的核心场景。</p> 
<p><br></p> 
<p><span style="font-size: 24px;">如何改？</span></p> 
<p>盘点现象，定义问题1、满足业务新的诉求：平台阶段性战略不同，1688从曾经的信息平台过渡到交易平台，如今向数字营销平台转型，旧的内容框架难以承载业务的新发展；2、提升分流质量：从过去的数据效果来看，需重新判断，在For特色采购需求和服务大面采购需求之前，如何平衡调优，提升首页的流量转化效能；</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01c68c5cdd2a95a801208f8bda733f.png" style=""></p> 
<p>3、体验升级：移动端APP天然生长在手机系统上，系统的风格更迭也牵动着APP的变化和升级。在8.0升级前，1688APP存在着5.0、6.0、7.0多个由不同设计师在不同时间点所设计的场景，到8.0，APP趋待从框架层、表现层以及品牌等方面进行统一及升级。</p> 
<p><br></p> 
<h2>改版策略</h2> 
<p><strong><em>一、聚焦用户价值，基于业务打法升级内容框架；</em></strong></p> 
<p>APP升级前与业务对焦，我们收到三点诉求：1、用算法的能力去承接首页买家的转化；2、搜索是B类买家找品、选商的核心工具，需要引导更多用户更高频地使用搜索；3、互联网流量红利到瓶颈期，需要进一步做好新用户的承接。</p> 
<p>在内容框架制定上，我们聚焦用户价值，舍掉7.0时的内容版块个性化，聚焦做商品的个性化，仅保留For大面用户的营销、内容场景，提升算法推荐区的曝光率，以此区域的商品做首页的直接转化。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01a7cd5cdd2a95a8012141682c29e1.png" style=""></p> 
<p><strong><em>二、弱化容器，突出内容，塑造心智</em></strong></p> 
<p>1、视觉容器升级</p> 
<p>做平视觉框架，选择“大间距分隔”，为内容留出干净、简洁的视觉空间。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01a82b5cdd2a95a801208f8b97784d.png" style=""></p> 
<p>精简内容删格，避免形式给用户阅读带来的负担。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01a5465cdd2a95a8012141689f8114.png" style=""></p> 
<p>提高留白率，提升页面整体的透气性，为内容留出更清爽、轻松的阅读空间。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0158cb5cdd2a95a801208f8b478975.png" style=""></p> 
<p>拉大字体大小的梯度，加重字体颜色梯度，提升文字的清晰度和可读性。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01c08b5cdd2a95a801214168d35546.png" style=""></p> 
<p>2、强调版块特性，塑造买家心智感知，达成业务目标。</p> 
<p>强化搜索：7.0时，曾上线过将搜索做到“主观上觉得显眼”的测试方案，但相较于之前沉浸式搜索，数据几乎没变化。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0103165cdd2a96a801208f8b46e0c7.png" style=""></p> 
<p>8.0阶段，从视觉表现层跳出看：“强化搜索”并不意味把搜索设计得更“显眼”，而是达成“让更多用户更高频地使用搜索”这一目标。(如提升搜索底纹词、热搜词精准度和吸引力、增加搜索布点等，都可能助力达成业务目标)基于用户单手操作时，拇指在屏幕不同区域的点击体验，选择将搜索组件移到更易于点击、视线更聚焦的屏幕位置，上线后数据提升非常明显。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01fe295cdd2a96a8012141687c4de6.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>Banner升级：7.0的Banner画面丰富度高，加之描述字段多，用户阅读有一定成本，较难在3秒内掌握全 Banner的信息。此外，相比于C类用户，B类用户会更偏理性，我们选择以更冷静、克制的“视觉语气”与B类商人对话，而非渲染氛围引导点击。(上线后，同样的活动内容，按新、老两版规范设计投放两套Banner，新版较老版UV CTR约高出48%)</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0129e45cdd2a97a801208f8bdca42c.png" style=""></p> 
<p>For新人：以差异化的利益、个性化秒杀、新人攻略做用户的承接。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0150885cdd2a97a801214168a144ea.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>营销场景心智差异化表达：营销由伙拼爆品、天天特卖两部分组成，我们判断爆品主打心智为“卖得火爆又便宜”，特卖主打心智是“限时限量抢便宜”，选择将两个区块最关键的特质做强化表达。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01892c5cdd2a97a801208f8b393f2a.png" style=""></p> 
<p>内容场景（直播）动态化、互动感、实时性传递：抽象出直播间的方形版面+内容叠加形式来设计，大坑位以动图传递给用户直播的动态感，以红包、个性化商品的多维实时轮播气泡传达直播的互动感、实时性。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0155a65cdd2a9aa8012141687613af.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><strong><em>三、升级品牌，贯穿APP场景</em></strong></p> 
<p>为什么要做APP应用内的品牌设计？</p> 
<p>品牌设计是将内容层(平台价值)与接收层(用户)做柔性链接的一环，譬如在APP场景中，由于有商品、商家、商机等“干货”，即使不特意做品牌设计，用户也能与平台保持刚性、稳定的连接；而反过来看，品牌做得很好，但平台没有“干货”，用户也不会单奔着品牌设计来平台。我们认为，做APP应用内的品牌设计，核心价值在于助力用户认知到平台特性，感知平台价值。从设计专业视角来看，APP应用内的品牌设计，有利于定义并统一APP内体验范式及视觉风格，保障用户的体验。</p> 
<p><br></p> 
<p>怎么做？</p> 
<p>每位设计师所处的业务环境不一样，解决问题策略和方式也千差万别，在APP应用内的品牌设计中，个人选择是通过厘清内容层(平台)多层次诉求及For用户的价值点，认知、感知接收层(用户)特质及内容倾向，基于内容层底料+接收层用户特质确定设计底层范式，塑造用户感知。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0123dd5cdd2a9aa801214168631196.png" style=""></p> 
<p>1、图形范式</p> 
<p>在阿里巴巴商业操作系统中，1688聚焦做B类业务，直接服务对象是B类买卖家，业务细分出档口尖货、淘工厂、企业采购、淘货源、微商代发、工业品超级店、跨境专供等，这些都是具有一定B类特质及体量感的场景，故在APP业务门洞及常规图标的表达上，基于扁平vs写实、轻盈vs厚重、活泼vs稳重的维度，图形选定轻拟物、弱对比的设计范式，塑造B类场景For买家的沉稳、份量感。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01f40d5cdd2a9ba801208f8b87a06e.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0148835cdd2a9ba8012141684bc668.png" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0152ea5cdd2a9ba801208f8b7b95ef.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01abbc5cdd2a9ba801214168b9e752.png" style=""></p> 
<p>此外，异常/空白场景也是平台与用户互动，塑造用户感知品牌的机会。在空态情感化插图部分的绘制上，力求塑形出有份量、易读、有意味的场景以示对应空态，并佐以轻微动效，增强空态的互动感。（在收藏夹、我的供应商等工具型场景，基于空态信息的价值考虑，将空态与工具新手引导相结合，并未做常规的插图)。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01bdbf5cdd2a9ca801208f8b91f0b3.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01fba25cdd2a9ca801208f8b446d50.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01dd5f5cdd2a9ca80121416891c326.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>2、色彩范式</p> 
<p>标准色</p> 
<p>随着业务的发展，我们基于新的业务态势，丰富了1688品牌色，以橙红色作营销、利益属性的表达，以商务蓝作服务、数字化属性的表达，以金色作权益属性的表达。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01754f5cdd2a9ca801208f8baa7a1b.png" style=""></p> 
<p>辅助色<br></p> 
<p>在实际产品设计中，品牌色并不足以表达各类业务场景中的多层次的内容。因此，基于VI品牌色，裂变出不同重量、层次更丰富的品牌辅助色。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01ad815cdd2a9ca80121416882c449.png" style=""></p> 
<p>场景用色规则</p> 
<p>基于买家角色及场景特征定义用色规则。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/011f165cdd2a9da801208f8b6df9c0.png" style=""></p> 
<p>1688色域及选色示意</p> 
<p>以HSB模式划定出偏沉稳的1688色域，在日常banner及业务场景中可灵活取用。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0160825cdd2a9da8012141680495e7.png" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01d53d5cdd2a9da801208f8b538fe8.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01fecb5cdd2a9da801208f8b3fd1d7.gif" style="">3、动效范式及应用</p> 
<p><br></p> 
<p>动效是设计的重要手段，良好的动效表达能增强信息表达强度，清晰信息层级关系，提升用户体验的舒适度。做动效之前，将APP信息结构平整到三层，保障内容在页面简洁明畅地呈现。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/016c825cdd2a9ea801208f8b4eff77.png" style=""></p> 
<p>在实际落地中，动效实现非常依赖技术资源，故动效设计之前，应考虑一个前提: 动效设计增益内容表达，价值可论证，效果可衡量；同时，考虑接收层用户的商人特质，我们期望动效表达给用户以稳定感，并且在设计表达上能兼顾效率。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/011b345cdd2a9ea801214168828634.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>在动效呈现部分，主要以缓入、缓出、缓动结合曲线来调节，总的来说，内容入场时节奏稍慢，速度缓，分层加载，交代清信息在Z轴上的层次关系，内容出场时节奏快，速度快，内容层级不用再做分层消失。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0116855cdd2a9ea801208f8b6d42c6.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>APP内典型场景的动效案例及演示。</p> 
<figure> 
 <br> 
</figure> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/01e2b75cdd2aa0a801214168a3e46c.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0182335cdd2aa2a801208f8be9fa52.gif" style=""></p> 
<p>4、业务品牌的价值传递</p> 
<p>此外，除以上在图形、色彩、动效等基础维度收口外，我们也需要将业务品牌放声给买卖家，以达成业务品牌的价值传递。在1688向数字营销平台转型的阶段，业务提出了“源头厂货通天下”的口号，我们通过设计手段，利用APP开机启动页及下拉刷新的空间，将“货通天下”的概念强化表达。</p> 
<p><img src="https://img.zcool.cn/community/0147845cdd2aa2a8012141681c20f1.gif" style=""></p> 
<p><strong><em><br></em></strong></p> 
<p><strong><em>结语</em></strong></p> 
<p>以上便是此次首页改版阶段性的记录。在8.0的视觉体系里，为更好地突出内容，视觉容器选择尽可能做轻、做平，以冷静、克制的“视觉语气”与B类商人对话——当然，这是设计师和业务同学阶段性的选择。后续品牌的完善及产品的优化，仍需结合数据持续打磨。</p>
                    <!--编辑器内容-->

        <div class="work-show">
            <ul class="work-con-box"></ul>
            <script id="other-work" type="text/html">
                {{each data as contentCard index}}
                <li class="work-show-item">
                    <a z-st="user_content_card_1_product_cover"
                       href="{{contentCard.pageUrl}}"
                       title="{{contentCard.title}}"
                       target="_blank">
                        <img src="{{contentCard.cover1x}}"
                             srcset="{{contentCard.cover2x}} 2x"
                             title="{{contentCard.title}}"
                             alt="{{contentCard.title}}">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var _vds = _vds || [];
    var article = document.getElementById("dataInput")
    var id = article.getAttribute("data-objid");
    var type = article.getAttribute("data-objtype");
    var catename = article.getAttribute("data-catename");
    var recommend = article.getAttribute("data-recommend");
    var isNew = article.getAttribute("data-isnew") == 1 ? "是" : "不是";
    _vds.push(['setPageGroup', 'DetailsPage']);
    _vds.push(['setPS1',id]);
    _vds.push(['setPS2',type]);
    _vds.push(['setPS3', catename]);
    _vds.push(['setPS4', recommend]);
    _vds.push(['setPS5',isNew]);
</script>

<script>
    gogoupDomain = 'gogoup.com';
    hellorfDomain = 'hellorf.com';

    passportDomain = 'passport.zcool.com.cn';
    staticDomain = 'static.zcool.cn/git_z';

    zMyDomain = 'my.zcool.com.cn';
    zMainDomain = 'www.zcool.com.cn';
    zRootDomain = 'zcool.com.cn';

    oldRootDomain = 'old.zcool.com.cn';

    appId = '1006';

    zUploadDomain = 'upload.zcool.com.cn';

    zProtocol = 'https://';
    logDomain = 'log.zcool.com.cn';
</script>



        <script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/lanage/messagesWeb.js?version=1557826964214"></script>
    
<script src="https://res.wx.qq.com/connect/zh_CN/htmledition/js/wxLogin.js"></script>
<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/build/js/libs.min.js?version=1557826964214"></script>
<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script>
    var onoff = false;
    $(window).scroll(function () {
        if($(document).scrollTop() > $('#footer').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
            onoff = true;
            ZcRelatedRecommend.relatedList();
        }
    })

        var objId = $('#dataInput').attr('data-objid');
        var objType = $('#dataInput').attr('data-objtype');

        var ZcRelatedRecommend = {
            URL: {
                LIST: zProtocol+ zMainDomain +"/content/relatedRecommend.json"
            },
            relatedList: function () {


                        $.ajax({
                            type: "GET",
                            url: ZcRelatedRecommend.URL.LIST,
                            data: {objectId: objId, objectType: objType},
                            xhrFields: {
                                withCredentials: true
                            },
                            crossDomain: true,
                            headers: {
                                "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                            },
                            dataType: "json",
                            success: function (data) {
                                if (data.code == 0 && data.data.length >= 4) {
                                    var html = template('detail-related-recommend-tpl', data);
                                    $("#detail-related-recommend").html(html).slideDown();
                                    compuTitWidth();
                                    var zid = $.cookie("zid");
                                    var uid = getUid();
                                    var ids = "";
                                    $.each(data.data, function (i, item) {
                                        if(i > 0){
                                            ids += ","
                                        }
                                        ids += (item.id + "_" + item.objectType + "_" + item.trackCode);
                                    });
                                    new Image().src = zProtocol+"log.zcool.com.cn/view.gif?t=detail_related_recommend&ids="+ids + "&vi=" + vi
                                                      + "&ti=" + new Date().getTime() + "&zid=" + zid + "&uid=" + uid;
                                    registerAuthorInfoEvent('#detail-related-recommend');
                                    asyncAttentionCall($('#detail-related-recommend'))
//                                    $('#detail-related-recommend').find('.showMemberCard').hoverDelay({
//                                        hoverEvent: function (e, t) {
//                                            //e.stopPropagation()
//                                            var me = $(t)
//                                            //加载用户卡片
//                                            loadUserData(me);
//                                        },
//                                        outEvent: function (e, t) {
//                                            //e.stopPropagation()
//                                            var me = $(t)
//                                            addHide(me)
//                                        }
//                                    });

                                }else{
                                    console.log("error:resault less than 4");
                                }
                            },
                            error: function(){
                                console.error("error:");
                            }
                        })

            }
        };

//        $('#detail-related-recommend').on('mouseenter', '.showMemberCard', function(e) {
//            e.stopPropagation()
//            var me = $(this)
//            //加载用户卡片
//            loadUserData(me);
//        })

    $(function () {
        function  mainStationRecommend(domId){

            var recommendCount = $("#" + domId + " .recommend-number").html();
            recommendCount = parseInt(recommendCount) + 1;

            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendId + " .recommend-number")
                .html(recommendCount);


            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendBigImageId + " .recommend-number")
                .html(recommendCount);
            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendBigImageId).removeClass("normal")
                .addClass("active")
                .attr("title", "你已经推荐过了");
        }
        ZcRecommend.init(mainStationRecommend)
    });
</script>

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826965747')
    }
</script>

                    srcset="{{data.avatar2x}} 2x"
                    width="80" height="80" alt="">
            </a>
            {{if data.memberType == 1}}
            <div class="company-honor"><img src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/images/svg/honor_authen.svg?v=3" title="企业认证用户" alt=""></div>
            {{else if data.memberType == 2}}
            <div class="company-honor"><img src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/images/svg/honor_authen.svg?v=3" title="工作室认证用户" alt=""></div>
            {{/if}}
        </div>
        <div class="presonal-info">
            <a href="{{data.pageUrl}}" target="blank_" class="author-name" z-st="user_card_name">{{data.username}}</a>
            {{each data.memberHonors as honor}}
            {{if honor.id != 9}}
                {{if honor.url != ""}}
                <a href="{{honor.url}}" target="blank_"><img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="" z-st="user_card_name"></a>
                {{else}}
                <a href="javascript:;"><img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="" z-st="user_card_name"></a>
                {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
            {{/each}}
        </div>
        <div class="position-info">
            <span title="{{data.cityName}} | {{data.memberType == 0 ? data.professionName : data.indusryName}}">{{data.cityName}}&nbsp;|
              {{if data.memberType == 0}}
                {{data.professionName}}
              {{else}}
                {{data.indusryName}}
              {{/if}}
            </span>
        </div>
        <div class="info-num">
            <div class="work">
                <p>创作</p>
                <a href="{{data.pageUrl}}" title="{{data.contentCountTips}}" target="blank_" class="num" z-st="user_card_products">{{data.contentCountStr}}</a>
            </div>
            <div class="fans">
                <p>粉丝</p>
                <a href="{{data.fansPageUrl}}" title="粉丝{{data.fansCountTips}}" target="blank_" class="num" z-st="user_card_fans">{{data.fansCountStr}}</a>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="btn-area">
            <div class="js-project-focus-btn">
            {{if data.guanzhuStatus == 1}}
            <input type="button" title="已关注" class="btn-current attention btn-default-secondary following" value="已关注" z-st="follow">
            {{else if data.guanzhuStatus == 2}}
            <input type="button" title="相互关注" class="btn-current attention btn-default-secondary" value="相互关注" z-st="follow">
            {{else}}
            <input type="button" title="添加关注" class="btn-default-main btn-current attention notfollow" value="关注" z-st="follow">
            {{/if}}
            </div>
            <input type="button" title="发私信" class="btn-default-secondary btn-current private-letter" value="私信"
                   onclick="prepareSendMessage('{{data.id}}','{{data.username}}')" z-st="privateMsg">
        </div>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var _vds = _vds || [];
    var product = document.getElementById("dataInput");
    var id = product.getAttribute("data-objid");
    var type = product.getAttribute("data-objtype");
    var catename = product.getAttribute("data-catename");
    var recommend = product.getAttribute("data-recommend");
    var isNew = product.getAttribute("data-isnew") == 1 ? "是" : "不是";
    _vds.push(['setPageGroup', 'DetailsPage']);
    _vds.push(['setPS1',id]);
    _vds.push(['setPS2',type]);
    _vds.push(['setPS3', catename]);
    _vds.push(['setPS4', recommend]);
    _vds.push(['setPS5',isNew]);
</script>

<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script>
    var onoff = false;
    $(window).scroll(function () {
        if($(document).scrollTop() > $('#footer').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
            onoff = true;
            ZcRelatedRecommend.relatedList();
        }
    })

    var relatedRecommendRetryCount = 0;

        var objId = $('#dataInput').attr('data-objid');
        var objType = $('#dataInput').attr('data-objtype');

        var ZcRelatedRecommend = {
            URL: {
                LIST: zProtocol+ zMainDomain +"/content/relatedRecommend.json"
            },
            relatedList: function () {
                var centerRelatedLenght = $('ul.picture-list-box > li').length;
                if (centerRelatedLenght && centerRelatedLenght >= 4){
                    // detailBottomRelatedData 在 detailpublic_new.js中声明并设置
                    if (detailBottomRelatedData && detailBottomRelatedData.data && detailBottomRelatedData.data.length === 4){
                        renderRelatedDom(detailBottomRelatedData);
                    }else {
                        $.ajax({
                                   type: "GET",
                                   url: ZcRelatedRecommend.URL.LIST,
                                   data: {objectId: objId, objectType: objType},
                                   xhrFields: {
                                       withCredentials: true
                                   },
                                   crossDomain: true,
                                   headers: {
                                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                                   },
                                   dataType: "json",
                                   success: function (data) {
                                       if (data.code == 0 && data.data.length === 4) {
                                           renderRelatedDom(data);
                                       }else{
                                           console.log("error:resault less than 4");
                                       }
                                   },
                                   error: function(){
                                       console.error("error:");
                                   }
                               })
                    }
                }else {
                    if(relatedRecommendRetryCount < 3){
                        setTimeout(function () {
                            ZcRelatedRecommend.relatedList();
                            relatedRecommendRetryCount ++;
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                }

            }
        };

        function renderRelatedDom(data) {
            var html = template('detail-related-recommend-tpl', data);
            $("#detail-related-recommend").html(html).slideDown();
            compuTitWidth();
            var zid = $.cookie("zid");
            var uid = getUid();
            var ids = "";
            $.each(data.data, function (i, item) {
                if(i > 0){
                    ids += ","
                }
                ids += (item.id + "_" + item.objectType + "_" + item.trackCode);
            });
            var vi = new Date().getTime();
            var ti = vi;
            statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","detail_related_recommend",ids,vi,ti);
            registerAuthorInfoEvent('#detail-related-recommend');
            asyncAttentionCall($('#detail-related-recommend'))
        }

//        $('#detail-related-recommend').on('mouseenter', '.showMemberCard', function(e) {
//            e.stopPropagation()
//            var me = $(this)
//            //加载用户卡片
//            loadUserData(me);
//        })
//        $('#detail-related-recommend').on('mouseleave', '.showMemberCard', function(e) {
//            e.stopPropagation()
//            var me = $(this)
//            addHide(me)
//        })
    $(function () {
        function  mainStationRecommend(domId){

            var recommendCount = $("#" + domId + " .recommend-number").html();
            recommendCount = parseInt(recommendCount) + 1;

            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendId + " .recommend-number")
                .html(recommendCount);


            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendBigImageId + " .recommend-number")
                .html(recommendCount);
            $("#" + ZcRecommend.domConfig.recommendBigImageId).removeClass("normal")
                .addClass("active")
                .attr("title", "你已经推荐过了");
        }
        ZcRecommend.init(mainStationRecommend)
    });
</script>

var _hmt = _hmt || [];
(function() {
  var common_appId = 1006;
  var app_host = 'https://www.zcool.com.cn';
  var hm = document.createElement("script");
  hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?eb739bb878f02b4f7b5352a0f4fea15c";
  var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; 
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s);
  
  $('#logout').on('click', function() {
	  $.ajax({
			url : "/logout.do?appId="+common_appId,
			type : "get",
			success : function(data) {
				var passportHost = window.location.host;
				 $z.logoutAppOne(passportHost);
				 $z.logoutAppThree(passportHost);
				 $z.logoutAppGogoup(passportHost);
				 $z.logoutProHellorf(passportHost);
				 $z.logoutHellorfPre(passportHost);
				 $z.logoutZDo(passportHost);
				 setTimeout(function(){
           window.location.href = (common_appId === 10145 || common_appId === 10143) ? '//passport.zcool.com.cn/loginApp.do?appId=' + common_appId : app_host;
				 },1000);
			}
		})
	});
})();
function doChangeLang(locale){
	$.get("/change_lang.do?locale="+locale);
	$.getJSON("http://www.zcool.com.cn/setting/u_lang?l="+locale+"&callback=?");
	$.getJSON("http://www.test.zcool.com.cn/setting/u_lang?l="+locale+"&callback=?");
	window.location.href = window.location.href.replace('locale=_en','').replace('locale=_zh','').replace('#','');
	//$.getJSON("http://dev.passport.zcool.com.cn/change_lang.do?locale=en&callback=?");
}

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826965747')
    }
</script>

        }
    </style>
</head>

    gogoupDomain = 'gogoup.com';
    hellorfDomain = 'hellorf.com';

    passportDomain = 'passport.zcool.com.cn';
    staticDomain = 'static.zcool.cn/git_z';

    zMyDomain = 'my.zcool.com.cn';
    zMainDomain = 'www.zcool.com.cn';
    zRootDomain = 'zcool.com.cn';

    oldRootDomain = 'old.zcool.com.cn';

    appId = '1006';

    zUploadDomain = 'upload.zcool.com.cn';

    zProtocol = 'https://';
    logDomain = 'log.zcool.com.cn';
</script>



        <script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/lanage/messagesWeb.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
    
<script src="https://res.wx.qq.com/connect/zh_CN/htmledition/js/wxLogin.js"></script>
<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/build/js/libs.min.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/statistics.js?version=1557826965747"></script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/widget/slider/js/unslider.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/biz/tuijian-designer.js?version=1557826965747"></script>
<script>
    $(function(){
        navTypeTopFix()
        /*-- 轮播图开始 --*/
        if ($.fn.unslider) {
            $('.banner').unslider({
                autoplay: true,
                arrows: true,
                speed: 500,
                delay: 3500,
                infinite: true,
                fluid: true
            })
        }

        $('.slider').hover(function (event) {
            event.stopPropagation()
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').show()
        }, function () {
            $(this).parents().children().find('.next,.prev').hide()
        })

        var onoff = false;
        function homeRelateUpdate(){
            if ($('.js-related-covers').length && $(document).scrollTop() > $('.js-related-covers').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
                onoff = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                            if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                                showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                        
                                $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})
                                
                                var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                                $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                                compuTitWidth();
                                registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                                asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                                // view
                                idss = "";
                                $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                    idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                                })
                                var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                                var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                                statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                        
                    }
                })
            }
        }
        homeRelateUpdate()
        $(window).scroll(function () {
            homeRelateUpdate()
        })
        // 点击推荐 ~ 换一换
        swithFlag = false;
        $('.home-switch').on('click',function(){
            if(!swithFlag){
                swithFlag = true;
                $.zTuijianDesigner.active({
                    pageSize:5,
                    renderRelatedSuccessTpl : function(data) {
                        // data.data.contents = data.data.contents.slice(0,5)
                        if(data.data.contents.length !== 0){
                            showLastContent = data.data.contents[data.data.contents.length - 1];
                            // 获取最后一个作品的id、type、day
                            $.cookie('activeDay','contentId=' + showLastContent.id + '_' + showLastContent.objectType + '&day=' + data.data.day,{expires: 30, path: '/', domain: '.' + zMainDomain.replace("www.", "").replace("my.", "")})

                            var relatedHtml = template('related-recommend-tpl', data)
                            $('#related-like').html(relatedHtml);
                            compuTitWidth();
                            registerAuthorInfoEvent('#related-like');
                            asyncAttentionCall($('#related-like'));
                            swithFlag = false;
                            // view
                            idss = "";
                            $.each(data.data.contents,function(i,v){
                                idss += v.id + "_" + v.objectType + "_" + v.trackCode + ","
                            })
                            var idssarray = idss.split(',');
                            var ids = idssarray.slice(0,idssarray.length -1).join();
                            statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","home_personal_recommend",ids,vi,ti)
                        }else{
                            $('.js-related-covers').remove()
                        }
                    }
                })
            }
        })
        
        
        if($('#cubeAd').length){
            var cube_ad = getCookieKey('cube_ad');
            var value = $('.ad-a img').attr('src')
            var cubeAd = value.substring(value.indexOf('community/'))
            if(cubeAd != cube_ad){
                $('#cubeAd').removeClass('hide')
                $('#body').addClass('cube-ad-body')
            }
        }
        
        $('#adClose').on('click',function(){
            
          setCookies_withDomain('cube_ad',cubeAd,zRootDomain)
          $('#cubeAd').addClass('hide')
          $('#body').removeClass('cube-ad-body')
        })
    })

</script>
</body>
</html>

<script>
function getLanguage() {
    var allcookie = document.cookie.split('; ');
    var language;
    for (var i = 0; i < allcookie.length; i++) {
        var cookiearray = allcookie[i].split('=');
        var cookiename = cookiearray[0];
        var cookievalue = cookiearray[1];
        if (cookiename == 'language') {
            //获取用户zid
            language = cookievalue;
            break;
        }
    }
    return language;
}
    function addLinkCss(linkUrl){
        var link = document.createElement('link');
        link.type = 'text/css';
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = linkUrl;
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
    }
    if(getLanguage() == "en_US"){
        addLinkCss('https://static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/common/css/zEnglishStyle.css?version=1557826857233')
    }
</script>
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/css/discover.css?version=1557826857233">
</head>

        <div class="avatar-container-80 z-center">
            <a href="{{data.pageUrl}}" title="{{data.username}}" target="blank_" class="author-avatar" z-st="user_card_face">
                <img src="{{data.avatar1x}}"
                    srcset="{{data.avatar2x}} 2x"
                    width="80" height="80" alt="">
            </a>
            {{if data.memberType == 1}}
            <div class="company-honor"><img src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/images/svg/honor_authen.svg?v=3" title="企业认证用户" alt=""></div>
            {{else if data.memberType == 2}}
            <div class="company-honor"><img src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/images/svg/honor_authen.svg?v=3" title="工作室认证用户" alt=""></div>
            {{/if}}
        </div>
        <div class="presonal-info">
            <a href="{{data.pageUrl}}" target="blank_" class="author-name" z-st="user_card_name">{{data.username}}</a>
            {{each data.memberHonors as honor}}
            {{if honor.id != 9}}
                {{if honor.url != ""}}
                <a href="{{honor.url}}" target="blank_"><img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="" z-st="user_card_name"></a>
                {{else}}
                <a href="javascript:;"><img src="{{honor.image}}" title="{{honor.name}}" alt="" z-st="user_card_name"></a>
                {{/if}}
            {{/if}}
            {{/each}}
        </div>
        <div class="position-info">
            <span title="{{data.cityName}} | {{data.memberType == 0 ? data.professionName : data.indusryName}}">{{data.cityName}}&nbsp;|
              {{if data.memberType == 0}}
                {{data.professionName}}
              {{else}}
                {{data.indusryName}}
              {{/if}}
            </span>
        </div>
        <div class="info-num">
            <div class="work">
                <p>创作</p>
                <a href="{{data.pageUrl}}" title="{{data.contentCountTips}}" target="blank_" class="num" z-st="user_card_products">{{data.contentCountStr}}</a>

<script>
    gogoupDomain = 'gogoup.com';
    hellorfDomain = 'hellorf.com';

    passportDomain = 'passport.zcool.com.cn';
    staticDomain = 'static.zcool.cn/git_z';

    zMyDomain = 'my.zcool.com.cn';
    zMainDomain = 'www.zcool.com.cn';
    zRootDomain = 'zcool.com.cn';

    oldRootDomain = 'old.zcool.com.cn';

    appId = '1006';

    zUploadDomain = 'upload.zcool.com.cn';

    zProtocol = 'https://';
    logDomain = 'log.zcool.com.cn';
</script>



        <script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/lanage/messagesWeb.js?version=1557826857233"></script>
    
<script src="https://res.wx.qq.com/connect/zh_CN/htmledition/js/wxLogin.js"></script>
<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/build/js/libs.min.js?version=1557826857233"></script>
<script>
    function logout() {
        $.ajax({
                   type: "GET",
                   url: "https://" + "my.zcool.com.cn" + "/logout",
                   data: {},
                   xhrFields: {
                       withCredentials: true
                   },
                   crossDomain: true,
                   headers: {
                       "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
                   },
                   dataType: "json",
                   success: function (data) {
                       console.log(data);
                       if (window.location.host.indexOf("my") != -1) {
                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', true, "https://" + 'www.zcool.com.cn');
                       } else {
                           // 在navComScript.js 中定义
                           update_unlogined_nav();

                           $z.logout('https://www.' + 'my.zcool.com.cn' + '/logout.do', '1006',
                                     'https://' + 'passport.zcool.com.cn', false);
                       }
                   }
               });
    }
</script>






<script type='text/javascript'>
    var tmp_uid;
    try {
        tmp_uid = getUid();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUid";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_ugender;
    try {
        tmp_ugender = getUGender();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUGender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }
    var tmp_uprofession;
    try {
        tmp_uprofession = getUProfession();
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getUProfession";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var tmp_language = $.cookie('language');
    if(tmp_language == null){
        tmp_language = "zh_CN";
    }

    var tmp_recommender;
    try {
      tmp_recommender = getUserInformationFromCookie().memberRecommender;
    } catch (e) {
        var url = zProtocol + logDomain+"/error.gif?type=zc_error_getURecommender";
        new Image().src = url;
    }

    var _vds = _vds || [];
    window._vds = _vds;
    (function(){
        _vds.push(['setAccountId', 'acec0eb2dafeaf05']);
        _vds.push(['trackBot', false]);
        _vds.push(['setCS1', 'uid', tmp_uid]);
        _vds.push(['setCS2', 'gender', tmp_ugender]);
        _vds.push(['setCS3', 'profession', tmp_uprofession]);

        _vds.push(['setCS4', 'language', tmp_language]);
        _vds.push(['setCS5', 'recommender', tmp_recommender]);

        (function() {
            var vds = document.createElement('script');
            vds.type='text/javascript';
            vds.async = true;
            vds.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'dn-growing.qbox.me/vds.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(vds, s);
        })();
    })();
</script>

<script src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/script/statistics.js?version=1557826857233"></script>

<!-- <script type="text/javascript" src="//static.zcool.cn/git_z/z/widget/comment/js/expression.js?version=1557826857233"></script> -->
<script>
	$(function(){
        navTypeTopFix();
		$('#custom-field-confirm-button').on('click', function(){
			var selectedCustomFields = '';
			$.each($('.self-type-combobox').find('input:checked'),function(data,item){
				selectedCustomFields = selectedCustomFields + $(item).attr('data-cid')  + ",";
			});
			$.ajax({
			   type: "POST",
			   url: zProtocol+zMainDomain+"/setting/discover/customFields" + "?customFields=" + selectedCustomFields.substring(0,selectedCustomFields.length-1),
			   xhrFields: {
				   withCredentials: true
			   },
			   crossDomain: true,
			   headers: {
				   "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
			   },
			   dataType: "json",
			   success: function(data){
				   console.log(data)
				   window.location.href = zProtocol + "www.zcool.com.cn/discover/-1!0!0!0!0!!!!2!-1!1";
			   }
		   });
		});
		$('#discover_filter_button_confirm').on('click', function(){
			var hasFile = $('#discover_filter_has_file').is(':checked') ? 1 : 0;
			var hasVideo = $('#discover_filter_has_video').is(':checked') ? 1 : 0;
			var city = $('#discover_filter_city').val() ? $('#discover_filter_city').val() : "";
			var college = $('#discover_filter_school').val() ? $('#discover_filter_school').val() : "";
			var device = $('#discover_filter_tool').val() ? $('#discover_filter_tool').val() : "";
			window.location.href = 'https://www.zcool.com.cn/discover/8!0!0!' + hasVideo + '!' + hasFile + '!' + device + '!' + college + '!' + city + '!2!-1!1';
		});
		$('#discover_filter_button_cancel').on('click', function(){
			$('.filtrate-info').hide();
		});
        $('.filtrate .select-selected-box').on('click',function () {
            $('.filtrate-info').toggle();
        })
	});
	$(function () {

		$("input[type=checkbox]").parent('label').on('click', function () {
			if ($(this).children('input').is(':checked')) {
				$(this).removeClass('auto-select-c').addClass('auto-select-cd')
			} else {
				$(this).removeClass('auto-select-cd').addClass('auto-select-c')
			}
		})
//		$('.classify-select').on('mouseenter','.self-defined',function () {
//			$(this).children('.self-type-combobox').removeClass('hide')
//		})
//		$('.classify-select').on('mouseleave','.self-defined',function () {
//			$(this).children('.self-type-combobox').addClass('hide')
//		})
		$('ul.classify-select-list').find('li.parents-nodes').hoverDelay({
											hoverDuring: 200, outDuring: 200,
											hoverEvent: function (e, t) {
												var me = $(t)
												showSubCate(me);
											},
											outEvent: function (e, t) {
												var me = $(t)
												hideSubCate(me)
											}
										});
		function showSubCate(thisDom){
			thisDom.addClass('current');
			thisDom.find('.type-combobox').removeClass('hide');
		}
		function hideSubCate(thisDom){
			thisDom.removeClass('current');
			thisDom.find('.type-combobox').addClass('hide');
		}
	})

    var onoff = false;
    $(window).scroll(function () {
        if ($(document).scrollTop() > $('.js-related-covers').offset().top - document.body.clientHeight && onoff == false) {
            onoff = true;
            relatedAlbumList();
        }
    })

    function relatedAlbumList() {
        var cateid = $('#dataInput').attr('data-cateid');
		var subCate = $('#dataInput').attr('data-secondary-cate');
        $.ajax({
			   type: "GET",
			   url: zProtocol + zMainDomain + "/collections/relatedCollection?cateId=" + cateid,
			   data: { cate:subCate},
			   xhrFields: {
				   withCredentials: true
			   },
			   crossDomain: true,
			   headers: {
				   "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"
			   },
			   dataType: "json",
			   success: function (data) {
				   if (data.code == 0) {
						if(data.data != ""){
							var html = template('album-related-tpl', data);
							$(".js-related-covers").html(html).slideDown();
							compuTitWidth();
							var ids = "";
							$.each(data.data, function (i, item) {
								if (i > 0) {
									ids += ","
								}
								ids += (item.id + "_" + item.objectType + "_" + item.trackCode);
							});
							var vi = new Date().getTime();
							var ti = vi;
                            statise_view("log.zcool.com.cn","discover_related_album",ids,vi,ti);
							registerAuthorInfoEvent('.js-related-covers');
							asyncAttentionCall($('.js-related-covers'))
						}
				   } else {
					   onoff = false;
				   }
			   },
			   error: function () {
				   console.error("error:");
			   }
		   })
    }
</script>
</body>
</html>
